item.title: bidi - l10n utilities
item.description: The bidi mixins are used to declare both the LTR and RTL values for a property together and output appropriate declarations. item.title: set-font-size mixin
item.description: The set-font-size mixin takes a single value. If the value’s unit of measure is pixels, it will return two versions of the font-size rule.
